title: UGREEN USB to USB C Adapter (2Pcs) 10Gbps Transfer Type C to A 3.0 OTG Adapter C Converter Compatible for Samsung S25 Ultra Series, for iPhone 17 Series, iPad, MacBook, Tablets, Earphone
raw_desc: 【10Gbps SuperSpeed】: UGREEN USB 3.0 to USB C Adapter has powerful performance and ransfers files at 10Gbps amazing speed. This USB C Converter can easily read 1TB hard drive data within a few seconds, reducing the memory burden for laptops, and data transmission is no longer stuck. Your mobile phones can also be connected to a U disk through this USB C Android Adapter to transfer photos, movies, music stably and quickly without any network traffic. 【Versatile USB-C OTG Adapter】: UGREEN Type- C OTG Adapter easily help your laptop/tablet/phone to connect USB-A devices, like USB hard drive, U disk, keyboard, mouse recievers, USB C headphones, USB WiFi adapter, game controller, camera, printer, USB and smartphone data cables. The USB C Mouse and Keyboard Adapter expands the storage space and usage space of your device better and faster, making your work more efficient, entertainment more convenient, and life more intelligent." 【Reliable & Durable】: The USB C Male to USB A Female Converter is made of solid aluminum alloy, with special aluminum frame, that dissipates heat at a faster speed and significantly improves data security. Plus, the USB C plug has passed thousands of repeated plugging and unplugging, as well as 24-hour salt spray test, which is wear-resistant and corrosion-resistant, provide a longer service life, which can make every use of yours full of security. 【Portable & Mini-sized】: UGREEN USB C Phone Adapter has a portable size and lightweight design occupies very little space and can use two adapters to connect mouse and keyboard at the same time. The interface of the USB C Male Adapter is firm and not easy to fall off. You can plug directly onto the end of your USB-C phones and take it wherever you go, solving the problem of lack of USB A interface. 【What You Get】: 2* UGREEN USB to USB C Silver OTG Adapter, 1*user manual, 24-month warrantyt, 24-hour customer service, lifetime technical support.
